test_results.test_name: Regular user accessing user profile should allow access to user profile
Regular user accessing admin panel should deny access to admin panel
Admin user accessing admin panel should allow admin access to admin panel
Regular user accessing resources outside business hours should deny access outside business hours for regular users
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "access_control"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "allow_access"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "deny_access"
Login event auditing should include "login" and "test_user" in the audit log
Login event auditing should include required audit fields
test_results.message:
Missing required fields: resource
Latest entry: {"timestamp"=>"2025-05-02T00:45:33.841Z", "event_type"=>"login", "user_id"=>"regular_user", "ip_address"=>"::ffff:127.0.0.1", "auth_method"=>"password", "outcome"=>"success"}

test_results.test_name: Resource access auditing should log data access in the audit log
Resource access auditing should include required fields
test_results.message:
Missing fields in resource access audit: resource
Latest entry: {"timestamp"=>"2025-05-02T00:45:33.841Z", "event_type"=>"login", "user_id"=>"regular_user", "ip_address"=>"::ffff:127.0.0.1", "auth_method"=>"password", "outcome"=>"success"}

test_results.test_name: Configuration change auditing should log configuration change in the audit log
Configuration change auditing should include all change tracking fields
test_results.message:
Missing fields in config change audit: resource, old_value, new_value
Latest entry: {"timestamp"=>"2025-05-02T00:45:33.841Z", "event_type"=>"login", "user_id"=>"regular_user", "ip_address"=>"::ffff:127.0.0.1", "auth_method"=>"password", "outcome"=>"success"}

test_results.test_name: Failed login auditing should record failed login in the audit log
Failed login auditing should include outcome: failure in audit entry
test_results.message:
Expected 'outcome' to be 'failure' but got 'success'
Entry: {"timestamp"=>"2025-05-02T00:45:33.841Z", "event_type"=>"login", "user_id"=>"regular_user", "ip_address"=>"::ffff:127.0.0.1", "auth_method"=>"password", "outcome"=>"success"}

test_results.test_name: Failed login auditing should include required fields for failed login
OPA interaction log should include audit keywords should contain 'audit'
OPA interaction log should include audit keywords should contain 'should_audit'
OPA interaction log should include audit keywords should contain 'audit_record_valid'
OPA interaction log should include audit keywords should contain 'flag_for_review'
Regular user authentication should authenticate regular user with password
Staff user authentication without MFA should reject staff authentication without MFA
Staff user authentication with MFA should authenticate staff user with MFA
Admin user authentication with MFA should authenticate admin user with MFA
Brute force detection should detect brute force attempts
Expired token validation should reject expired tokens
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "authentication"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "authentication_valid"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "token_is_valid"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "mfa_used"
Authorized configuration change should allow authorized configuration change
Unauthorized configuration change (non-admin user) should deny configuration change by non-admin user
Unauthorized configuration change (outside allowed hours) should deny configuration change outside allowed hours
test_results.message: expected "Configuration changes are only allowed during business hours (9am-5pm)" to include "outside allowed hours"

test_results.test_name: Configuration compliance check should validate compliant configuration
Configuration non-compliance check should identify non-compliant configuration
Component inventory check should validate component in inventory
Component not in inventory should identify component not in inventory
Dependency check should validate approved dependencies
Unapproved dependency check should identify unapproved dependencies

File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "dependencies_approved"
Valid input submission should accept valid input
SQL injection attempt should reject SQL injection attempt
XSS attempt should reject XSS attempt
Input length validation should reject input exceeding maximum length
Email format validation should reject invalid email format
Date format validation should reject invalid date format
